rtl_rules: Mirror all margins and paddings (ms-*, me-*)
Mirror flex direction for row layouts
Use logical properties (start/end) instead of left/right

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200
cards.header: flex flex-row items-center justify-between space-y-0 pb-2

buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-colors

charts.style: Minimalist, no grid lines, rounded bars, custom tooltips

instructions_to_main_agent: DO NOT use 'Inter' font for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Ensure all text is legible against the background (Contrast Ratio > 4.5:1).
Implement a 'Theme Toggle' (Light/Dark) in the settings or header.
For Arabic support, ensure the 'dir' attribute on the HTML tag changes to 'rtl' when Arabic is selected.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
All interactive elements must have a 'data-testid'.
Follow the 'Bento' grid layout for the dashboard.
Use 'shadcn/ui' components but customize them to match the 'Swiss Utility' theme.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
